name: SummaryGPT
description: Web-app that uses the OpenAI API to summarize YouTube videos in paragraph and bullet-point format

name: Financial News Keyword Extractor
description: A script that that web scrapes financial articles from Reuters and extracts key-words from each article using tools such as TF-IDF vectorization and POS tagging.

name: Image Editing Application
description: A Java application that can edit images (such as apply filters and resize), comes with a GUI and a text-based control system. Source code avaliable upon request.

name: Hybrid Assymetric-Symmetric Encryption
description: My first side-project. In this project, I wrote text and image RSA/AES encryption scripts from scratch in Python.
